description: Contains a combination of Route Load data and User Interactions performed by Elite Orgs.

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date the route load or user interaction occurred on.

schema.name: timestamp
schema.description: The timestamp the route load or user interaction occurred on.

schema.name: resource
schema.description: Stripped down name of the route minus org and query params.

schema.name: type
schema.description: Indicates if the record is for a User Interaction or Route Load.

schema.name: name
schema.description: The name of the user interaction performed, or 'route.load' if a Route Load.

schema.name: org_name
schema.description: The name of the org that the route load or user interaction was performed for.

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The org for this route load or user interaction, joinable with clouddb.organizations.

schema.name: user_id
schema.description: The user id of the user who loaded the page or performed the interaction.

schema.name: email
schema.description: The email of the user who loaded the page or performed the interaction.

schema.name: duration_ms
schema.description: The duration, in milliseconds, that the route load or user interaction took to complete.

schema.name: team_owner
schema.description: Team that owns and maintains this route.

schema.name: raw_url
schema.description: The exact URL where the metric occurred.
